name: Forest of Hell
description:
The plot takes place in a forest, the player wakes up in a hut and does not know how he got there.

He discovers that the hut is locked and he has to solve clues to get out of it, after he manages to escape from the hut he discovers he is in the middle of a forest full of traps and monsters and he must escape the forest while he is kidnapped by aliens who want to experiment on him and see how he survives their experiment.

The genre of the game is horror/puzzle, where the player can die in two cases: loss of sanity or loss of life, when life symbolizes physical damage and sanity mental damage, physical damage caused by traps or monsters, and mental damage caused by failure of puzzle or after time Multi without progress.
